metadata.title: CVE-2021-47312 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: Fix dereference of null pointer flowIn the case where chain->flags & NFT_CHAIN_HW_OFFLOAD is false thennft_flow_rule_create is not called and flow is NULL. The subsequenterror handling execution via label err_destroy_flow_rule will leadto a null pointer dereference on flow when calling nft_flow_rule_destroy.Since the error path to err_destroy_flow_rule has to cater for nulland non-null flows, only call nft_flow_rule_destroy if flow is non-nullto fix this issue.Addresses-Coverity: ("Explicity null dereference")

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
